job_details.Vacaturetitel: Web Developer/App Developer/Assistant Web Developer/Assistant App Developer (at the rank of IT Officer/IT Technician)
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ideate, architect, and deploy AI-centric solutions.

   * Work closely with teams to design and implement AI-driven Web/Mobile Applications and Tools.

   * Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance. Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments.

   * Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web/Mobile and AI technologies.
job_details.full_text:
Web Developer/App Developer/Assistant Web Developer/Assistant App Developer (at the rank of IT Officer/IT Technician)

* Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to ideate, architect, and deploy AI-centric solutions.

   * Work closely with teams to design and implement AI-driven Web/Mobile Applications and Tools.

   * Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance. Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments.

   * Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web/Mobile and AI technologies.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on web and app development with an AI component, but lacks the depth and specific technical requirements for a dedicated ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. The responsibilities are broad and include system maintenance and staying informed on trends, which are not core to specialized AI engineering roles. The title itself suggests a more general IT or development role rather than a specialized AI engineering position.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'design and implement AI-driven Web/Mobile Applications and Tools' directly relates to building software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: design and implement AI-driven Web/Mobile Applications and Tools

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance' and 'Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments' describe operational responsibilities for maintaining systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Oversee and assist in server and system maintenance. Promptly identify and rectify issues in both production and UAT environments

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'architect... AI-centric solutions' implies involvement in the foundational design of AI systems, which can encompass data aspects.
The phrase 'Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web/Mobile and AI technologies' indicates a need for continuous learning and adaptation.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web/Mobile and AI technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams' highlights the need for teamwork and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Stay informed on the latest trends and advancements in both Web/Mobile and AI technologies
